qas.question: What airport is closest to Valencia?
What airport is south of Valencia?
What is the main train station in Valencia?
What group runs Valencia's public transit?
What station in Valencia was built for high-speed trains?

context: Public transport is provided by the <a3_0>Ferrocarrils de la Generalitat Valenciana<a3_0/> (FGV), which operates the Metrovalencia and other rail and bus services. The <a2_0>Estació del Nord<a2_0/> (North Station) is the main railway terminus in Valencia. A new temporary station, <a4_0>Estación de València-Joaquín Sorolla<a4_0/>, has been built on land adjacent to this terminus to accommodate high speed AVE trains to and from Madrid, Barcelona, Seville and Alicante. <a0_0>Valencia Airport<a0_0/> is situated 9 km (5.6 mi) west of Valencia city centre. <a1_0>Alicante Airport<a1_0/> is situated about 170 km (110 mi) south of Valencia.
